document_data.name: Pebble Wind
document_data.mainbody: '''''Pebble wind''''' was a spell that created a vertiginous mass of air.
document_data.Effects: When cast, the spell acted in a similar fashion as the ''[[gust of wind]]'' spell, but with a key difference. ''Pebble wind'' not only belted a target with a strong wind, but created a whirlwind that picked up debris such as rocks and [[sand]] and even small items. This created a swirling cloud of detritus. The damage inflicted upon a creature was dependent on what type of debris; loose soil inflicted little damage while pebbles and ricks inflicted more. If a creature was knocked over by the gusts of wind, they fell in a random direction.
document_data.Components: This spell required only a [[verbal component]].
